meanings.definition: A compound containing an arsenic atom bonded to a hydrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of arsines in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled the arsines with caution.
meanings.sent3: The arsines in the experiment seemed to dance under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The smell of arsines lingered in the air, reminding them of their chemistry lesson.
meanings.sent5: The bright color of the arsines made them stand out among the other compounds.

meanings.sent1: The container held various arsines for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The students learned about arsines in their science class.
meanings.sent3: The arsines on the shelf looked like a tiny army of molecules.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of arsines, each with its own story.
meanings.sent5: The teacher pointed to the arsines on the chart, emphasizing their importance in chemistry.
